me kauthukagara bhumiye ithihasagatha dumriya madiri kihipayak pradarshanayata thaba atha. 1898 warshaye palamuwana mangala dumriya gaman giya enjima, danata lowa nirmanaya wu ton 294k bara emenma ekwara ton 1200 ka barak adiya haki enjima ee athara we. 1900 wasaredi mombasa sita wiktoriya wila dakwa dumriya margaye idikirim katayuthu wethdi mombasa nagaraye sita kimi. 400k durin pihita athi kima nagarayedi sar henri chals riyal namaththa sinhayeku athin dumriya madiriya thuladima marum ka awasthawa sihipath kerena ema dumriya madiriyada narambaannange daka ganima sandaha pradarshana bhumiye thaba atha. 1973 warshayedi wiliyam basil wisin handunwadun rel pili pariksha kirima sandaha rel pili matha yana bayisikalaya da me authukagaraye pradarshanayata thaba atha.
